Package org.argouml.modules.andromda.ui.wizards

Wizards Wizard component for SwixML slightly derived from the ideas which was described at http://www.ideas2work.com/WizardEngine.html

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
WizardListener This class mange the changes between screen in a wizard.
 

Class Summary
DefaultWizardDialog This is a sample and empty implementation of the Wizard.
WizardColorConverter This WizardColorConverter class add the color 'LABEL_BG' and 'LABEL_FG' which return the color of the JLabel.
WizardDialog This is the class which define a Wizard.
WizardEvent This is the event generated by action on a Wizard.
WizardFrame A Wizard(test)Frame
WizardPage This is a class which is use to distinguish screens in a wizard definitions file.
 

Package org.argouml.modules.andromda.ui.wizards Description

Wizards

Wizard component for SwixML slightly derived from the ideas which was described at http://www.ideas2work.com/WizardEngine.html
